name: 1941 and a Half (C64)
description:
A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

1 Player Fun Arcade Like Shoot 'em' up, Fly your plane and shoot the other Planes and Boats, Fly into the Ballon's for Bonus Points.

Made with the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and with added Seuck Enhancment Framework V3 by Richard Bayliss of TND, Title Music also by Richard Bayliss.

Also should work on NTSC C64 as it has some small code for showing the score but i have not TESTED this, so yeah have FUN.

I'm Running out of Idea's now so this might be my Last Game at least for a while.
